steps.conclusion: None. The suggestions comply with the law-specific rules, include the exact topic "International Law," keep titles in English with <=5 words, avoid level/joiner words and course/program terms, set is_language_course=false, include english_title correctly, and use tabler- icons.
None. "International Court of Justice" as a course title is acceptable and still single-topic. All fields meet constraints.

Could add a few more highly relevant international law subfields to increase coverage (e.g., International Human Rights Law, International Criminal Law, Law of the Sea, International Trade Law). Optionally consider a broader procedural topic like International Dispute Settlement. Current set is strong but could be richer.
